metadata.title: CVE-2020-12863 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read in SANE Backends before 1.0.30 may allow a maliciousdevice connected to the same local network as the victim to read importantinformation, such as the ASLR offsets of the program, aka GHSL-2020-083.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12863` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsane - 1.0.25+git20150528-1ubuntu2.16.04.3
libsane-common - 1.0.25+git20150528-1ubuntu2.16.04.3
sane-utils - 1.0.25+git20150528-1ubuntu2.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sane-backends package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25+git20150528-1ubuntu2.16.04.3').
